.. _sorting-layouting:

###################
Sorting / Layouting
###################

1) Download the GFA from here (????)...
2) odgi build
3) odgi viz (unsorted)
4) odgi sort + a little explanation of what is happening, maybe with a cool GIF too
5) odgi viz (sorted)
6) odgi layout + a little explanation of what is happening, maybe with a cool GIF too
7) gfaestus
